description: Make this show-stopping chocolate cake layered with chocolate frosting, fresh cream and berries the centrepiece of your festive celebrations.
name: Chocolate & Berry Layer Cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300 ml Pura Double Thick Dollop Cream

recipeInstructions.text: Using a handheld balloon whisk, lightly whisk cream and icing sugar until soft peaks form. (Don't overwhisk.) Cut cake in half horizontally. Place cake base on a serving plate. Spread cake with frosting followed by 2/3 of the cream mixture. Arrange half of the berries on top. Sandwich with cake top. Gently spread with remaining cream and top with remaining berries. Serve.
